review: The physical hardware is great, but the software leaves some things lacking.  I wish there was an included browser.  That would make it handy for things that don't have an app yet for the Apple TV (Pandora, Spotify, etc.).  I have locked mine up multiple times when I have left something paused for long periods of time (like overnight).
